formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: \[ \bigl|\mathbf{a} \times \mathbf{b}\bigr| = |\mathbf{a}|\,|\mathbf{b}| \sin\theta. \] \(|\mathbf{a} \times \mathbf{b}|\) equals the area of the parallelogram spanned by \(\mathbf{a}\) and \(\mathbf{b}\). The area of the triangle with sides \(\mathbf{a}\) and \(\mathbf{b}\) is \(\dfrac{1}{2}|\mathbf{a} \times \mathbf{b}|\).
